Title: Object: La Madonna della Scudella
Description: Holy Family, after Correggio's Madonna della Scodella; the Virgin Mary sits on the ground in the bottom left, holding a bowl (scodella) in her right hand; the young Jesus is on Mary's lap, holding Joseph's right hand; Joseph, standing on the right, hands a branch of palm tree to angels hovering above among clouds; two further figures and a donkey visible in the background. 1778 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Simon Jean François Ravenet
Curator's comments: Annotations on verso: 'Before date 1529 - before the ad. letter Chiesa si S. Sepolcro in Parma'. For state with these alteration see 1837,0408.115 See Mussini, 'Correggio Tradotto', 1995, p. 212.
Bibliographic references: Le Blanc 1854-89 / Manuel de l'Amateur d'Estampes 1550-1820 (2)
Subjects: return of the holy family from egypt
Acquisition notes: Annotated on verso: '[?] and Ford 1[?]25 - Proof'.
